abstract: Europe’s financial difficulties have created the opportunity of a lifetime for ambitious idea merchants looking for fame; top economic policy theorists like Graham Bishop, Daniel Gros and Markus K Brunnermeier are promoting competing plans for solving Europe's debt debacle.
